answers.answer: I also have neuropathy, it's all over my body and very painful, and none of the meds the doctors gave take my pain away. American Diabetes Association forum has great information for neuropathy pain.Best to you

question: what can i do for the neuropathy pain in my feet all the drugs that i have taken do not work . my pain dr, suggested that i rake a epidural. what do you think about that?
